poem:
### The Leak

A slip of paper—  
unseen, unattended—  
winds through corridors  
of power and trust,  
ripple without water.  
Richard stands,  
holds the shadow,  
a weightless burden,  
as numbers dance—  
a silent waltz  
on everyone's lips,  
whispering blame.  
Budget chaos  
dressed in urgency,  
vanishes into today's  
morning leaves.
